overview: FBI Lovebirds: UnderCovers is a groundbreaking new play based on the transcripts of Peter Strzok and Lisa Pageâ€™s secret text messages and their answers to prolonged questioning in private congressional hearings. The script is written by Phelim McAleer and is completely verbatim and is exclusively comprised of text messages and congressional hearing transcripts.
title: FBI Lovebirds: UnderCovers
